Package org.thewhitemage13.interfaces

Interface EmailValidationServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailValidationServiceImpl
public interface EmailValidationServiceInterface
Interface defining methods for email validation services.

This interface provides methods for validating email addresses during user registration and email update operations. It ensures that email addresses are unique and not already in use.

Key Features:

  • validateUpdateEmail(String) validates an email during the update process.
  • validateEmail(String) validates an email during the registration process.
  • Both methods throw an EmailBusyException if the email is already in use.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • validateUpdateEmail

      void validateUpdateEmail(String checkEmail) throws EmailBusyException
      Validates the email address during an update process.

      This method checks if the provided email is already in use by another user. If the email is taken, an EmailBusyException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      checkEmail - the email address to be validated
      Throws:
      EmailBusyException - if the email is already in use by another user

    • validateEmail

      void validateEmail(String checkEmail) throws EmailBusyException
      Validates the email address during the registration process.

      This method checks if the provided email is already in use by another user. If the email is taken, an EmailBusyException is thrown.

      Parameters:
      checkEmail - the email address to be validated
      Throws:
      EmailBusyException - if the email is already in use by another user
